THE MINECRAFT MOVIE IS JUST AROUND THE CORNER
Minecraft 大电影 蓄势待发！

Normally, when we’re talking about blockbusters on Minecraft.net, we’re being clever (or so we like to think!) about pickaxes. Sometimes about shovels.
Well, it looks like we may have to come up with new and funnier, punnier puns (as if that’s even possible) for future pickaxe-related musings. Why? ** above will be taken. Because today, we’re beyond excited to reveal the premiere date for the upcoming Minecraft movie!
（此处省略超难翻译的双关）因为今天，我们很高兴能公布即将到来的Minecraft大电影首映日！

That date is March 4, 2022. Does it sound distant? We beg to differ! It’s only 1053 days. Or about 34 months, or 150 weeks, or a million and a half minutes. Not that we’re counting, of course. Besides, it turns out that making a live-action, full-length feature film is really complicated!
那一天就是2022年3月4日，这听起来很遥远吗？我们可不同意，这才只有1053天而已，或者说大约34个月，150周，或者150万分钟。当然不是我们说是哪天上映就是哪天上映的！事实证明，制作一部真人的、全长的电影超级复杂！

So, what do you have to look forward to, roughly 25,000 hours from now? Well, as you devour your movie snack of choice (we like a suspicious stew with a side of square watermelon), we’ll tell you the story of a teenage girl and her unlikely ** adventurers. After the malevolent Ender Dragon sets out on a path of destruction, they must save their beautiful, blocky Overworld. Sounds ambitious! Luckily, the very talented director Peter Sollett (Nick & Norah’s Infinite Playlist) will be making sure everyone stands in the right place and delivers award-worthy performances. No pressure! Also, we’re partnered with Warner Bros, a company that’s been around the block. So to speak. What we’re trying to say is, this movie is in very capable hands!
那么，从现在开始的大约25000个小时，你有什么期待的呢？好吧，当你在开始吃爆米花的时候，我们会告诉你这个故事是一个十几岁的小女孩和他们的一群不可思议的冒险家朋友的故事，当邪恶的末影龙开始四处破坏，他们必须拯救他们美丽的方块主世界。这一听就是大制作！幸运的是，才华横溢的导演Peter Sollett将确保每个人都各司其职的将这部电影做到最好，毫无压力！此外，我们还与华纳兄弟公司（Warner Bros）合作。我们想说的是，这部电影的投入和力量将非常强大！

Since we’re a game developer first, making a movie will be new and very **. And while the movie has to be different from the game (otherwise, you’d be in for an infinite movie in very low resolution) one thing will definitely be the same. We want to make the movie — just as we make the game — for you. We’re inspired by countless things, but none as much as the incredible stuff our community creates in Minecraft every day. So keep it coming!
由于我们是游戏开发者，所以制作电影可是件新活，我们也非常兴奋。虽然电影必须和游戏不同（不然你就只能看一部马赛克电影了），但有一件事是不会变的，我们想为各位玩家制作电影 - 正如我们制作游戏一样。我们受到了无数事物的启发，但没有像我们的社区每天在Minecraft中创造的令人难以置信的东西那么多，所以加油吧！

In summary: the movie has a date. It has a director. It has an official storyline, and we’re NOT AT ALL COUNTING THE DAYS TO THIS MONUMENTAL EVENT. 1053, 1052, 1051...
总结：电影定档了！而且有一个导演，有一个官方的故事简介，我们没有在为这部大制作进行倒计时... 1053,1052,1051 ......
